subject: Tennis
Charter Schools
lead_paragraph: Andre Agassi speaks about life after tennis, including his efforts to finance up to 75 charter schools in the United States and how he actually enjoys tennis more now that he doesn't play it.
snippet: Andre Agassi speaks about life after tennis, including his efforts to finance up to 75 charter schools in the United States and how he actually enjoys tennis more now that he doesn't play it.
